name: Holzmaler

review text: The cocktails were very nice, and we spent 2.5 hours here with zero problem. However, when we went to ask the bartender what drink he was making while sitting at the bar, he literally freaked out and gave us a lecture about bothering him. …

One of the best Cocktail places in Stuttgart.
Decent but not snobbish atmosphere.
Fair pricing for superb drinks. Crowd is a mixture of students, boheme and established people. Ring the bell!

One of the.. sorry the best bar experience in the city. A hidden gem, authentic as it can be in the most authentic neighborhood.
Great spot for an intimate date, a classy boys night out or simply a place to go …

Absolutely incredible! The best signature smoky old fashion I have ever drunk.
Elegant, with style, prices €€ lovely atmosphere with Spanish guitar music.
Attention and good service.
What they do is magical.
Used to be a speak easy now you just need to knock. Classy cocktails in what feels to be a hidden part of Stuttgart

Great hidden gem in this city in the style of a speakeasy. Place is cozy, and the staff is extremely friendly. Max behind the bar was helpful and the guys make great cocktails. If you're lucky, you might get Juno playing some music on the open mic, which will make for a great night.
A very good cocktail bar in the heart of the now-hipster red light district as many other cocktail joints.

The place is nice and cozy, but the bar staff was extremely unfriendly, and also rude. No one in the group wanted to go and order the next rounds because the bartender (the bald gentleman with glasses) was almost scary to interact with, so …
The drinks were truly amazing, staff is really competent and friendly, the environment is very relaxed and welcoming .. i just loved this place..
Nice place. Deffinately a hole in the wall.  They did not serve us because they had no seating.  We had 8 in our party, they had 6 customers and could only seat 3 of us.  You can do the math.

Great cocktails and great prices. Really cool bar with hipster vibes. Felt like I was in Brooklyn or Portland.

name: FOU FOU | Cocktail- und Champagnerbar

review text: The coctails are awesome. My favorite bar in Stuttgart ❤️

It’s a great cozy bar located in the heart of the old
City of Stuttgart. In fact, it’s placed right on the red light district which gives it a special vibe. The staff is extremely friendly and the owners surely had …

It takes forever to get a cocktail, but the wait is worth it. Cool vibe with three different floors/areas to lounge, dance, hang out. Very popular place, but we luckily found a table with table service. Our server was very friendly and the bartender could shake her drinks!
Cocktails were just amazingly delicious, super friendly service, good atmosphere, care to every detail... I am definitely coming bach there.

I had drinks after dinner with friends, very good cocktails, the barman had a great energy, he was super nice and chatty and help us spend a nice night out! Probably my fav cocktail bar in stuttgart till now!
Delicious drinks, dope beats and good vibes. Best thing though was the bar staff, absolutely beautiful humans inside and out. 11/10 would recommend.
Probably The worst coctail bar that I ever been. I will never forget the attitude and impoliteness.

Nice coktail bar.  Cozy place for weekend or afterwork to have a coktail and enjoy.  Friday and Saturday they have DJ and it is much more crowded. It is friendly to internationals and to groups.  Not romantic but ok for a date...  you have to try it!
For me personally one of the best bars in Stuttgart. Great service with bartenders who take their time to serve you an individualized cocktail - and this always with a smile:-) Great!

YOU CAN'T GET IN BECAUSE YOU DONT HAVE A GIRL WITH YOU! Im really tired of this behaviour. This is what you get in a lot of places in Stuttgart. There was friend of mine visiting from US and started to pour outside. So we decided to stop …

My family and I visited from America in March. Best Food, best service and best family owned restaurant I ever been to! Everything was so clean and the quality food was amazing. Wish we discovered it sooner than we had while we were there!

I paid a visit here while on vacation. The food was excellent service was very friendly and the restaurant was impeccably clean.  Overall a great family owned restaurant.   Wish I could visit it on a weekly basis.
Nice straight forward Swabian restaurant with some Korean fusion added to it. I've eaten here several times and have never been disappointed.

name: Schwarz Weiß Bar

review text: I didn’t order from the menu. The bartender recommended 2 cocktails for me. And it’s exactly what I want. In terms of the cocktails, I give it a 10 out of 10.

The best bar tenders and all staffs with passion and performance, herbs flavors all perfect match and soooooo many special and all flavors covered whiskey collection that so difficult to find in other places. Right place in winter for warm …

Excellent cocktails and the staff is really friendly. The cocktails are phenomenal and the atmosphere of the bar is really cozy, with good jazz playing on the back and low light. Diogo makes really good improvised cocktails, and off the menu I personally recommend the Old Fashioned.

Great atmosphere and friendly qualified bartenders! Cocktails are always tasty and the menu is often updated, so there’s always something new to try. And you can get customized drinks to your own taste anytime, I have to admit that I was amazed once or twice or three times ;)
The best bar for good cocktails and you don't need to know what to order just tell them how you feel and what your taste is. The rest is magic.
Great bar, open late, with helpful and friendly staff and a great selection of whisky!

It’s a really cool place! Tiny space, but lovely people. Their cocktails are fantastic! You should ask the bartender for their specials. Only real downside is that people smoke inside, but I guess that’s also something that makes this bar unique.

I love whiskey so I also love here.

Nice music and surroundings. …
Fantastic Bar in Stuttgart City. Remarkable Cocktails and super Service. I recommend the Cocktail of the Day 😁👍 …
Best Cocktail i had so far in stuttgart. Most importantly, they give you this feeling that your experience is really important to them so you have to go back again. …

HIGHLIGHT: Classic cocktails & inventive creations in a low-lit, wood-paneled venue with jazz music.

Thank you for the great monkey 47 and aquaverdi gin tonics ;)  I came across a super nice Irish gin you must try - boatyard double gin. It would make a great addition to your selection. Works magic in a negroni too
Good atmosphere, their variety of Gins is crazyyy and the staff is polite and helpful. Loved this place.

I love this place, great drinks, love the design and it has an excellent environment
Pretty bar in Stuttgart. Definitely worth a visit.

review text:
Super stylish bar🥰 beautiful atmosphere
Beautiful spirit selection!
Friendly bartenders - ask for their recommendations, its so worth it…
Ask for Rum Flor de Caña ♻️ …
Outstanding Bar with great decorations, super cocktails all creative and tasty combined with friendly and knowledgeable staff. It’s easy to recognize here is somebody at work who likes what he does.

Great cocktails and even friendlier service. The owner was quite nice and took time to talk with us and explain the menu. The drinks were very good and fairly priced for the quality. The bartender had some good fun with us, as we did tongue …

Such a fun bar with such unique drinks. Attention to every detail has been looked at to create this vintage vibe- including the menu being made to look like an old French newspaper. The 1920s and 30s jazz music was also a nice touch. They did have outdoor seating- but the indoor seating was perfect for our date night
Best place for cocktails. Place has ambience with indoor and outdoor seating.
We had three different signature drinks, all three did not really please us. Besides the atmosphere was very busy, noisy and a bit turbulent. But they are making an effort and interior is nice.
Super vibe in this cocktail bar! Hidden Pearl in Stuttgart! It’s is like going back in time. Great service. If you go to Stuttgart must visit!
What a lovely, cozy bar. The drinks are delicious. It was my first time here but it won’t be my last.

I’ve been wanting to go here for a while. We went out to celebrate a special occasion and made reservations. The host was wonderful. The cocktails though…. Not great. Very expensive for the quality. I will gladly pay 12-15€ for an amazing …
Fantastic! Amazing cocktails and amazing staff. Lovely decor and attention to detail. Must go!!!

I came to visit Stuttgart and I at this place is good so I come here with 4 of my my male friends and the door keeper say to us that we cannot enter inside because we are  5 guys. …
We are anti smokers so we always sat ourside. Inside is for smokers

when you walk in, it's like walking into a coal fire, so smoked up you can't breathe.
they have this peculiar tradition of taking your drink once you set it down - …

Awsome bar during the day and really cool club over weekends, with the best service in the city😎👌 …
The music was ok, kind of activating.  For a girl's night or a friend's evening ist a guy choose!
Great food

review text: Went three times while visiting Stuttgart with a friend. Saturday lunchtime quiet but nice, evening crazily busy (!) and monday evening a nice in between. Excellent bar staff and nice clientele. Definitely recommend!

Nice place to start your night life in Stuttgart, not a great ambience but good for students and impromptu meeting.

name: Nova Bar

review text: Great place, great food, great people! This is a lovely natural wine bar that offers a cosy and friendly space. The dishes are well curated and the owners know how to diversify them, adapting to the seasons. Sometimes, you will even find guest chefs for a few days!

review text: I didn’t order from the menu. The bartender recommended 2 cocktails for me. And it’s exactly what I want. In terms of the cocktails, I give it a 10 out of 10.

The best bar tenders and all staffs with passion and performance, herbs flavors all perfect match and soooooo many special and all flavors covered whiskey collection that so difficult to find in other places. Right place in winter for warm …

Excellent cocktails and the staff is really friendly. The cocktails are phenomenal and the atmosphere of the bar is really cozy, with good jazz playing on the back and low light. Diogo makes really good improvised cocktails, and off the menu I personally recommend the Old Fashioned.

Great atmosphere and friendly qualified bartenders! Cocktails are always tasty and the menu is often updated, so there’s always something new to try. And you can get customized drinks to your own taste anytime, I have to admit that I was amazed once or twice or three times ;)
The best bar for good cocktails and you don't need to know what to order just tell them how you feel and what your taste is. The rest is magic.

I love whiskey so I also love here.

Nice music and surroundings. …

name: Mos Eisley

review text: Friendly staff and nice location. Outdoor seating as well as a second floor. Food is focused on vegetarians - do not expect the satisfaction of a steak House visit here ;-) Food is healthy and prepared well (in stark contrast to other local kitchen..) Need to return to check out the music events!
The food and atmosphere was great, staff was exceptional ❤️
One of the coolest bar and eating place in Stuttgart and the location is just so convenient, just outside the staddmite u bahn towards fritz elias strasse. Prices for food and drinks are reasonable.
Every year Stuttgart Expat Meetups hold their May the 4th be with you Star Wars day party here. Trendy little bar and the upstairs has been developed now too!

Great atmosphere. Enjoyed a beer with friends down stairs. It was a Sunday so the service was a little slow as the bartender was also waiting on tables. The smoke from the club upstairs was noticeable but not too offensive. Id definitely return.

Live music was upstairs, so downstairs was still quiet enough for conversation while enjoying the music. The bartender was fantastic - friendly and made excellent drinks. The Darth Vader painting in the hallway was a great touch.

Nicely decorated bar on the ground floor, good for grabbing a drink and eat something. The music is generally good. On the first floor there's sort of a nightclub, with live music & DJs occasionally. It's a shame that as it's allowed to smoke at the nightclub, it's covered with a stinky cloud of smoke

Went here on May the fourth, had expected more of a Star Wars feel inside but there was not one. However the wild garlic soup was delicious, and I was pleased with the overall atmosphere of this bar/pub.
I love it, I like it , I want it. Nice bar with awesome minimal Techno in a Friday night. Great drink selection and food available what more a man need. One if my favorite I. Stuttgart
They only accept cash. Everything else was good.

review text: Cool bar in the center of Stuttgart. Cocktails and music are very nice. The outside vibe is so chill-out.

It is crowded always, and it is normally hard to get a table here for you. You will get a nice beer, and they play nice music. You can definitely enjoy your drinks here. I came here with my colleagues and it was literally difficult to get a table. Overall I would say it was a nice visit.

Love being here after work. Always good music and good atmosphere.

Greetings, Elza …

It is probably the best place to have a drink in the centre of Stuttgart. The people having their drink there seemed nice and well dressed, giving the feeling of upper middle class. The music was "smooth" allowing one to have a drink …

Nice bar, centrally located right across the Schlossplatz. In summer it's great to sit outside on the stairs and enjoy a drink while looking at the busy Koenigstrasse. I think the prices are too high though (8€ for a glass of white wine?!), The crowd is trendy, too much sometimes ;)

name: 1.Stock

review text: Best techno Party of whole Stuttgart

This is one of the new hot places in Stuttgart. The entrance is between a falafel place (which is amazing btw) and a porn cinema. After entering a bouncer will check you and let you in if there's still space. Which might not always be the …
Low
Cooler Spot

Die wahrscheinlich coolste, kleine Bar in Stuttgart  -  mit langer Tradition und definitivem Absturzpotential. Schon vor 20 Jahren war der 1. Stock eine Institution, vor allem für die Stuttgarter. Leute, die gerne auf der Theo flanieren oder …

Mit viel Liebe zum Detail wurde hier ein schönes, für Stuttgart untypisches Ambiente geschaffen. Man darf kein schickimicki Fan sein (siehe Toilette, die von meinen Leuten gerne als Fotokulisse genutzt wird), aber wird definitiv seinen Spaß & günstige Getränke im 1. Stock finden!
Klein, schäbig und eigentlich nur etwas für saufabende die schon etwas fortgeschritten sind. …

Coole Bar mit günstigen Preisen (Shots 2€) und Musik, zu der häufig getanzt wird. Ist also fast schon ein kleiner Club. Leider sehr klein, weshalb es oft voll ist. Die Toilette (Singular!) geht aber gar nicht...
Richtig gute elektronische Musik findet man einfach in den kleinsten Bars. Im Vergleich zum Dresden ist es hier nicht so voll und man kann die Musik noch genießen.
Getränke sind recht günstig, die Musik ist ok, wenn man den Stil mag. Allerdings ist es hier sehr verraucht und die eine Toilette ist totaler Schrott...

name: Nova Bar

review text: Great place, great food, great people! This is a lovely natural wine bar that offers a cosy and friendly space. The dishes are well curated and the owners know how to diversify them, adapting to the seasons. Sometimes, you will even find guest chefs for a few days!

Awesome place and awesome vibes. There is quality on literally every sense you will experience. Good music for your ear and good tastings from the well curated wine and cuisine menu. An absolut must go in Stuttgart!

If you know the owner I’m sure you will have a good time. If not… well unfortunately you will be treated like that. Be aware that you cannot put your belongings/ coats on the empty stools even if the bar is quiet empty… just in case someone walks in? If you do the service will defo make you feel unwelcome.
Great place! Barkeeper was fun and helpful recommending delicious wine
The place is amazing, keep it going 🤌🏻 …
Top!
Von diesen Locations brauchen wir mehr in Stuttgart! Gute vibes, gute drinks, gutes essen. Man spürt die Liebe zu den Produkten und die Leidenschaft der Hosts für das Konzept.

review text: The coctails are awesome. My favorite bar in Stuttgart ❤️

It’s a great cozy bar located in the heart of the old
City of Stuttgart. In fact, it’s placed right on the red light district which gives it a special vibe. The staff is extremely friendly and the owners surely had …

Probably The worst coctail bar that I ever been. I will never forget the attitude and impoliteness.

For me personally one of the best bars in Stuttgart. Great service with bartenders who take their time to serve you an individualized cocktail - and this always with a smile:-) Great!

I really liked my visit here! Super friendly staff, good cocktails and beers, neat toilet, lovely red furniture, great location by the Hans in Luck fountain!
I came to visit Stuttgart and I at this place is good so I come here with 4 of my my male friends and the door keeper say to us that we cannot enter inside because we are  5 guys. …
We are anti smokers so we always sat ourside. Inside is for smokers

when you walk in, it's like walking into a coal fire, so smoked up you can't breathe.
they have this peculiar tradition of taking your drink once you set it down - …

Went on friday night last great bar, great music, tried to return the following night man on the door was not nice what so ever for no reason this man thinks hes better than he is management should look at door staff on this night.
Awsome bar during the day and really cool club over weekends, with the best service in the city😎👌 …
The music was ok, kind of activating.  For a girl's night or a friend's evening ist a guy choose!

name: White Noise

review text: This place (the club) has a very Berlin vibe. Industrial deco, electro music. Perfect if you want something different (10euros entry). There is also the white noise bar just opposite if you want to chill a bit before !

Pinsa is a great addition to White Noise.   The Pinsas were really delishes and the staff is always fun. Like a Pizza but more fluffy and crispy at the same time. The toppings were just right. The bar and outside area is always a relaxing places to be...for drinks, friends ....and now Pinsas too.
Cool musical atmosphere with drinks for fair prices. On the "grandstand" you rest your legs while refreshing the talks or just fill your head into the speakers.
Even though there were only 7 people left in the club, they asked us for the full price. We left 5 minutes after entering. That was on a Friday. It sucked.
Cool bar, not so expensive with nice bear and cozy atmospherea
One of my favorite spots in Stuttgart to go out party and have a blast!
Great Base, nice music overall. Great atmosphere. Kind people.
Favorite place, though drinks could be better.

name: Nova Bar

review text: Great place, great food, great people! This is a lovely natural wine bar that offers a cosy and friendly space. The dishes are well curated and the owners know how to diversify them, adapting to the seasons. Sometimes, you will even find guest chefs for a few days!

Awesome place and awesome vibes. There is quality on literally every sense you will experience. Good music for your ear and good tastings from the well curated wine and cuisine menu. An absolut must go in Stuttgart!

If you know the owner I’m sure you will have a good time. If not… well unfortunately you will be treated like that. Be aware that you cannot put your belongings/ coats on the empty stools even if the bar is quiet empty… just in case someone walks in? If you do the service will defo make you feel unwelcome.
Great place! Barkeeper was fun and helpful recommending delicious wine
The place is amazing, keep it going 🤌🏻 …
Top!
Von diesen Locations brauchen wir mehr in Stuttgart! Gute vibes, gute drinks, gutes essen. Man spürt die Liebe zu den Produkten und die Leidenschaft der Hosts für das Konzept.

Grundsätzlich schönes, individuelles Ambiente welches mit toller Musikanlage und Beschallung einlädt. Jedoch Schränken unbequeme Sitzmöbel und ungenügende Freundlichkeit des Gastgebers das Erlebnis stark ein. …

Irgendwie mal was anderes! Ich mags. Nettes Personal, freundliches Publikum. Diverse Weine und eine Liebe zum Essen. Trinkt sich gut und schmeckt. Bin gespannt auf die jungen engagierten Besitzer:innen was sie noch so einfallen lassen. Looking forward!

Kleiner Laden, kleine Drinks. Zielgruppenorientierte Beratung. Wenn man seltsam spezielle Weine und einen leicht überforderten Barmann (für das Standardgeschäft) mag, dann ist die Nova Bar ein Geheimtipp. Spaß hat man aber woanders.

name: Mos Eisley

review text: Friendly staff and nice location. Outdoor seating as well as a second floor. Food is focused on vegetarians - do not expect the satisfaction of a steak House visit here ;-) Food is healthy and prepared well (in stark contrast to other local kitchen..) Need to return to check out the music events!
The food and atmosphere was great, staff was exceptional ❤️
One of the coolest bar and eating place in Stuttgart and the location is just so convenient, just outside the staddmite u bahn towards fritz elias strasse. Prices for food and drinks are reasonable.
Every year Stuttgart Expat Meetups hold their May the 4th be with you Star Wars day party here. Trendy little bar and the upstairs has been developed now too!

Great atmosphere. Enjoyed a beer with friends down stairs. It was a Sunday so the service was a little slow as the bartender was also waiting on tables. The smoke from the club upstairs was noticeable but not too offensive. Id definitely return.

Live music was upstairs, so downstairs was still quiet enough for conversation while enjoying the music. The bartender was fantastic - friendly and made excellent drinks. The Darth Vader painting in the hallway was a great touch.

Nicely decorated bar on the ground floor, good for grabbing a drink and eat something. The music is generally good. On the first floor there's sort of a nightclub, with live music & DJs occasionally. It's a shame that as it's allowed to smoke at the nightclub, it's covered with a stinky cloud of smoke

Went here on May the fourth, had expected more of a Star Wars feel inside but there was not one. However the wild garlic soup was delicious, and I was pleased with the overall atmosphere of this bar/pub.
I love it, I like it , I want it. Nice bar with awesome minimal Techno in a Friday night. Great drink selection and food available what more a man need. One if my favorite I. Stuttgart
They only accept cash. Everything else was good.

name: Waranga

review text: Cool bar in the center of Stuttgart. Cocktails and music are very nice. The outside vibe is so chill-out.

It is crowded always, and it is normally hard to get a table here for you. You will get a nice beer, and they play nice music. You can definitely enjoy your drinks here. I came here with my colleagues and it was literally difficult to get a table. Overall I would say it was a nice visit.

Love being here after work. Always good music and good atmosphere.

Greetings, Elza …

It is probably the best place to have a drink in the centre of Stuttgart. The people having their drink there seemed nice and well dressed, giving the feeling of upper middle class. The music was "smooth" allowing one to have a drink …

Nice bar, centrally located right across the Schlossplatz. In summer it's great to sit outside on the stairs and enjoy a drink while looking at the busy Koenigstrasse. I think the prices are too high though (8€ for a glass of white wine?!), The crowd is trendy, too much sometimes ;)

Really nice bar, was really buzzy on. Saturday afternoon. They have really nice refreshing drinks and cocktails with a twist, reminded me of a cool East London hangout without being overpriced and a bit more mainstream. Nice deco and lots of outside space. Also dog friendly which is a bonus.
Everytime when I visit Stuttgart, It's a must for me to drink something in Waranga. …
Awesome vibe. Good EDM music. Have an open air dance club. We went there on a Saturday night. Location and crowd both are good. Drinks are reasonably priced. We had a fantastic time!

The pub is nice and beautiful, but the dj was changing music constantly, people also just sit fown instead of dancing. Wierd place, i might still visit it because of the ambience, hope people will be dancing next time i go there
Cool place in the city centre. Amazing drinks, friendly staff, diverse and stylish crowd. Perfect place to hang out on a warm summer evening.

review text: Best techno Party of whole Stuttgart

This is one of the new hot places in Stuttgart. The entrance is between a falafel place (which is amazing btw) and a porn cinema. After entering a bouncer will check you and let you in if there's still space. Which might not always be the …
Low
Cooler Spot

Die wahrscheinlich coolste, kleine Bar in Stuttgart  -  mit langer Tradition und definitivem Absturzpotential. Schon vor 20 Jahren war der 1. Stock eine Institution, vor allem für die Stuttgarter. Leute, die gerne auf der Theo flanieren oder …

Mit viel Liebe zum Detail wurde hier ein schönes, für Stuttgart untypisches Ambiente geschaffen. Man darf kein schickimicki Fan sein (siehe Toilette, die von meinen Leuten gerne als Fotokulisse genutzt wird), aber wird definitiv seinen Spaß & günstige Getränke im 1. Stock finden!
Klein, schäbig und eigentlich nur etwas für saufabende die schon etwas fortgeschritten sind. …

Coole Bar mit günstigen Preisen (Shots 2€) und Musik, zu der häufig getanzt wird. Ist also fast schon ein kleiner Club. Leider sehr klein, weshalb es oft voll ist. Die Toilette (Singular!) geht aber gar nicht...
Richtig gute elektronische Musik findet man einfach in den kleinsten Bars. Im Vergleich zum Dresden ist es hier nicht so voll und man kann die Musik noch genießen.
Getränke sind recht günstig, die Musik ist ok, wenn man den Stil mag. Allerdings ist es hier sehr verraucht und die eine Toilette ist totaler Schrott...

name: ZO'E

review text:
Probably  one of the worst experiences in Stuttgart...
We were going to have one cocktail ( decided on a cocktail tour -4-5 different places) just to get a good idea what’s what anymore... …

Profiling against men! Men are not allowed to sit alone, without girls, because men are perverts in their view. This did not happen once but multiple times. And yes it is my fault to go there repeatedly unlearning the manner of their treatment. Never again.
Place to be if you like smoking sisha and people watching

Horrible place, turned away business from 5 men because we didn’t have one girl with us. Lost out on over €200, great way to do business?! This will be another casualty of the high street within 1 year.  Avoid and visit L’Oasis instead. Do not waste your time with this place.

Monday night, went to ZOEs for Shisha with 5 guys, let me clarify it’s a Monday night, we were turned away as we did not have any girls with us. Turning away over €300, that really makes business sense!!! Instead we found L’Oasis who are more then accommodating!

This is a very strange place. After we sat down and ordered and the order came the waiter came and told us we have to change to a table very far away from where we were sitting just because their rules says no two men should not sit alone. This was in the afternoon and we were sitting outside. I never heard of such a rule in my life.

Very good service, nice stuff, good shisha
perfect location near the old town

Shisha pipe looks promising but they are usinh strange tobacco so taste is below average in Stuttgart. Do not reccommend if you are seeking for decent pipe.

review text: Friendly staff and nice location. Outdoor seating as well as a second floor. Great atmosphere. Enjoyed a beer with friends down stairs. It was a Sunday so the service was a little slow as the bartender was also waiting on tables. The smoke from the club upstairs was noticeable but not too offensive. Id definitely return.

Hanky Panky is my favorite bar in Stuttgart! It looks amazing inside and they have a nice courtyard outside in the summer. The drinks are reasonably priced unlike most places in Germany which are way more expensive. And Josef the owner makes some fancy drinks to impress your date. I highly recommend this bar if you are in town.
Cocktails were fantastic. The sugar cookie was my favorite this time. Others in the bar were friendly as were the bartenders. …
Chill spot in a quiet neighborhood. Great cocktails, nice ambiance.
One of my favourite bars in the city! The atmosphere is great, the bartenders very nice and you get free chips. Cocktails are not obvious and made with good quality ingredients. …
Great cocktails and interior! I got fortune cookie. Just look at the glass. Creative! Quiet and chilled place to have delicious cocktails
Very cool bar, very good drinks. Unfortunately quite small and had to stand. But if you book in advance I'm sure you can have great experience.

name: Waranga

review text: Cool bar in the center of Stuttgart. Cocktails and music are very nice. The outside vibe is so chill-out.

It is crowded always, and it is normally hard to get a table here for you. You will get a nice beer, and they play nice music. You can definitely enjoy your drinks here. I came here with my colleagues and it was literally difficult to get a table. Overall I would say it was a nice visit.

Love being here after work. Always good music and good atmosphere.

Greetings, Elza …

It is probably the best place to have a drink in the centre of Stuttgart. The people having their drink there seemed nice and well dressed, giving the feeling of upper middle class. The music was "smooth" allowing one to have a drink …

Nice bar, centrally located right across the Schlossplatz. In summer it's great to sit outside on the stairs and enjoy a drink while looking at the busy Koenigstrasse. I think the prices are too high though (8€ for a glass of white wine?!), The crowd is trendy, too much sometimes ;)

Really nice bar, was really buzzy on. Saturday afternoon. They have really nice refreshing drinks and cocktails with a twist, reminded me of a cool East London hangout without being overpriced and a bit more mainstream. Nice deco and lots of outside space. Also dog friendly which is a bonus.
Everytime when I visit Stuttgart, It's a must for me to drink something in Waranga. …
Awesome vibe. Good EDM music. Have an open air dance club. We went there on a Saturday night. Location and crowd both are good. Drinks are reasonably priced. We had a fantastic time!

The pub is nice and beautiful, but the dj was changing music constantly, people also just sit fown instead of dancing. Wierd place, i might still visit it because of the ambience, hope people will be dancing next time i go there
Cool place in the city centre. Amazing drinks, friendly staff, diverse and stylish crowd. Perfect place to hang out on a warm summer evening.

Super stylish bar🥰 beautiful atmosphere
Beautiful spirit selection!

Ask for Rum Flor de Caña ♻️ …
Outstanding Bar with great decorations, super cocktails all creative and tasty combined with friendly and knowledgeable staff. It’s easy to recognize here is somebody at work who likes what he does.

Cooler Spot

Die wahrscheinlich coolste, kleine Bar in Stuttgart  -  mit langer Tradition und definitivem Absturzpotential. Schon vor 20 Jahren war der 1. Stock eine Institution, vor allem für die Stuttgarter. Leute, die gerne auf der Theo flanieren oder …

Mit viel Liebe zum Detail wurde hier ein schönes, für Stuttgart untypisches Ambiente geschaffen. Man darf kein schickimicki Fan sein (siehe Toilette, die von meinen Leuten gerne als Fotokulisse genutzt wird), aber wird definitiv seinen Spaß & günstige Getränke im 1. Stock finden!

Getränke sind recht günstig, die Musik ist ok, wenn man den Stil mag. Allerdings ist es hier sehr verraucht und die eine Toilette ist totaler Schrott...

Coole Bar mit günstigen Preisen (Shots 2€) und Musik, zu der häufig getanzt wird. Ist also fast schon ein kleiner Club. Leider sehr klein, weshalb es oft voll ist. Die Toilette (Singular!) geht aber gar nicht...
Richtig gute elektronische Musik findet man einfach in den kleinsten Bars. Im Vergleich zum Dresden ist es hier nicht so voll und man kann die Musik noch genießen.
Getränke sind recht günstig, die Musik ist ok, wenn man den Stil mag. Allerdings ist es hier sehr verraucht und die eine Toilette ist totaler Schrott...

review text: Me and a friend went here Friday. We heard Friday nights were hip hop/ R&B night but when we got there it was a special night. The guy at the door said special night with dancers etc. We paid 15 euro and it was Spanish music all night with …

This "bar" turned nightclub is terrible. It is located in a large shopping mall with a small space in the corner. There is mostly men in the club, most people of color, and very few women (attractive ones at that). The music is decent and the atmosphere is somewhat of a "dive club" if there was such a thing.

Love this place, good both Friday and Saturday, albeit Friday is mostly R&B!!!  I wish they would be open on Wednesdays, as I would love to have a drink.  Groovy crowd, as there are few places for this type of music in Stuttgart with a good representation of Ur an culture.   GO!!!!!!!!

Love coming here, Dj spinning the wheels, music blasting, thumping bass to numb your problems away, a wide array of drinks, Friday nights is best, courteous security and warm reception. Dj could do better with the playlist,  Hot 97 to the rescue 😁 …

review text: Simply amazing atmosphere! Absolutely one of my favourite places as a student!
One of the most happening campus bars in Stuttgart. A great place for beer and cocktail at the heart of the city!
One of the best student bars in Stuttgart and definitely the best Campus bar out of all the ones in Universität Stuttgart.

name: Ehli Keyf Stuttgart

review text: Best shisha in town. The personnel will greet you with charisma and good mood making you feel always welcome.

I think they have an attitude that does not suit human dignity, it is very bad to be exposed to such discrimination, especially in Germany. They choose people according to their clothes and gender. In other words, if you have a stylish br …

Gute Drinks und Shishas. Das besondere ist aber, dass es sich hier nicht um eine weitere klischeehafte Shisha Bar handelt. Wirklich großartiger Service in einem tollen Ambiente und das zu fairen Preisen. Definitiv eine Bereicherung für das eher Hipster-lastige Stuttgart West.

Unglaublich, der ganze Laden ist komplett leer aber der Mitarbeiter erzählt was von notwendiger Reservierung am WE. Sind leider extra auf Empfehlung hin aber keinen Meter wert. Geht lieber gleich ins Zoé oder 327 etc
Echt süßer Laden und das Personal war auch sehr freundlich. Die Shisha war richtig gut! Kann ich weiterempfehlen 👍🏻 …

Sehr schöne authentische Shisha-Bar mit toller Einrichtung. Eine Mischung aus Moderne und Tradition sorgt für eine entspannte Atmosphäre. Leckere Cocktails mit frischen Zutaten sowie ein sehr netter Besitzer und eine hervorragende Shisha.
Eine sehr entspannte Location mit sehr leckeren Coctails. Der wichtigste Punkt meiner Rezession ist natürlich die perfekte Zubereitung der Shisha - 1A.
Sehr schöne Bar mit wunderschön orientalischem Ambiente. Immer wieder gerne zu Besuch, um am Notebook zu arbeiten oder entspannt mit Freunden beisammen zu sein.

Wer dort eine Pide oder etwas Ähnliches zubereiten lässt, hat immer eine Anekdote zu erzählen, von der erstaunlichen Chefin, klein aber wendig oder dem sprachbemühten Mitarbeiter, der sogar "mit allem?" fragt.

10 min auf erste Ansprache durch Bedienung gewartet. Wurden weggeschickt mit der Begründung, dass man reservieren muss.
Abgewiesen trotzt leerem Laden. Es gibt deutlich bessere Alternativen. Reservierung werden nicht mal auf Insta kommuniziert.
